clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of SGLT2 Inhibitor on Blood Glucose Profile in Type 2 Diabetic Patients Using Basal Insulin
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of SGLT2 Inhibitor on Blood Glucose Profile in Type 2 Diabetic Patients Using Basal

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The change of glycemic variation and insulin dose after adding SGLT2 inhibitor in type 2 diabetic patients treated with basal insulin was observed in a single center.

primary_outcome.description: Changes of glycemic variation assessed by CGM before and after SGLT2 inhibitor adding

secondary_outcome.description: Change of insulin dose before and after SGLT2 inhibitor adding

arm_group.description: The patients who are using basal insulin therapy with or without oral hypoglycemic drugs will be added SGLT2 inhibitor treatment

intervention.description: Patients will be gave SGLT2 inhibitor 10mg per day
